name: Camera
Camera
Remove
Options
Image
Context
format:
<script>
var ctx = null;
var canvas = null;
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        if (!msg)
            return;
        if( msg.topic.split("/")[0] !== "tracker" )
            return;
        if(!tracker_settings_context)
            return;
        var object = msg.payload;
        tracker_settings_context.lineWidth = 3;
        tracker_settings_context.strokeStyle = '#00FF00';
        tracker_settings_context.beginPath();
        tracker_settings_context.rect( object.x, object.y, object.w, object.h );
        tracker_settings_context.stroke();
    });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Address

name: Filter
Reset
Context
format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        if (!msg || msg.topic !== "reset" || !tracker_settings_image || !tracker_settings_context)
            return;
        if( tracker_settings_area ) {
            tracker_settings_area.setOptions({ hide: true });
            tracker_settings_area = null;
        }
        tracker_settings_image.attr("src","");
        tracker_settings_context.beginPath();
        tracker_settings_context.clearRect(0, 0, 1000, 1000 );
        tracker_settings_context.stroke();        
    });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Context
format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        if (!msg || !tracker_settings_context || !tracker_settings_image )
            return;
        console.log("Tracker Settings");
        
        if( tracker_settings_area ) {
            tracker_settings_area.setOptions({ hide: true });
            tracker_settings_area = null;
        }
            
        tracker_settings_area = tracker_settings_image.imgAreaSelect( {
            x1: parseInt(msg.payload.tracker.x1 / 1000 * tracker_settings_x),
            x2: parseInt(msg.payload.tracker.x2 / 1000 * tracker_settings_x),
            y1: parseInt(msg.payload.tracker.y1 / 1000 * tracker_settings_y),
            y2: parseInt(msg.payload.tracker.y2 / 1000 * tracker_settings_y),
            show: true, hide:false, minHeight: 5, minWidth: 5, handles: true, movable: true, resizable: true, instance:true,
            onSelectEnd: function( image, area ) {
                var zone = {
                    x1: parseInt((area.x1/tracker_settings_x) * 1000),
                    x2: parseInt((area.x2/tracker_settings_x) * 1000),
                    y1: parseInt((area.y1/tracker_settings_y) * 1000),
                    y2: parseInt((area.y2/tracker_settings_y) * 1000)
                };
                scope.send({
                    topic: "zone",
                    payload: zone
                });
            }
        });
    });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Query
Flow Clock
reset
Image
Context - Heatmap
format:
<script>
var ctx = null;
var canvas = null;
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        if (!msg)
            return;
        if( heatmap_area ) {
            heatmap_area.setOptions({ hide: true });
            heatmap_area = null;
        }
            
        if(!heatmap_context)
            return;
        heatmap_context.beginPath();
        heatmap_context.clearRect(0, 0, 1000, 1000 );
        heatmap_context.stroke();
            
        var list = msg.payload;

    	heatmap_context.strokeStyle = "#FFFFFF";
    	heatmap_context.lineWidth = 2;
    	heatmap_context.beginPath();
        list.forEach(function(item){
        	heatmap_context.moveTo(item.bcx, item.bcy );
    	    heatmap_context.arc( item.bcx, item.bcy, 6, 0, 2 * Math.PI);
        	heatmap_context.lineTo(item.pcx, item.pcy );
        	heatmap_context.lineTo(item.cx, item.cy );
        })
    	heatmap_context.stroke();
    });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Query
Area Selection
format:
<script>
var heatmap_area = null;
var heatmap_birth = {x1: 200,y1: 200,x2: 800,y2: 800}
var heatmap_death = {x1: 200,y1: 200,x2: 800,y2: 800}
var heatmap_selection = null;
var heatmap_selection_name = null;

(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        if (!msg || !heatmap_context || !heatmap_image )
            return;
        console.log("Birth & Death");
        if( heatmap_area ) {
            heatmap_area.setOptions({ hide: true });
            heatmap_area = null;
        }
        heatmap_selection = null;
        if( msg.topic === "birth")
            heatmap_selection = heatmap_birth
        if( msg.topic === "death")
            heatmap_selection = heatmap_death
        if( heatmap_selection === null )
            return;
        heatmap_selection_name = msg.topic;
        heatmap_area = heatmap_image.imgAreaSelect( {
            x1: parseInt(heatmap_selection.x1 / 1000 * heatmap_x),
            x2: parseInt(heatmap_selection.x2 / 1000 * heatmap_x),
            y1: parseInt(heatmap_selection.y1 / 1000 * heatmap_y),
            y2: parseInt(heatmap_selection.y2 / 1000 * heatmap_y),
            show: true, hide:false, minHeight: 5, minWidth: 5, handles: true, movable: true, resizable: true, instance:true,
            onSelectEnd: function( image, area ) {
                if( heatmap_selection === null )
                    return;
                heatmap_selection.x1 = parseInt((area.x1/heatmap_x) * 1000);
                heatmap_selection.x2 = parseInt((area.x2/heatmap_x) * 1000);
                heatmap_selection.y1 = parseInt((area.y1/heatmap_y) * 1000);
                heatmap_selection.y2 = parseInt((area.y2/heatmap_y) * 1000);
                scope.send({
                    topic: heatmap_selection_name,
                    payload: heatmap_selection
                });
            }
        });
    });
})(scope);
</script>

    return;

msg.camera.agent.mote = msg.payload.mote.active
msg.camera.agent.vod = msg.payload.vod.active

return msg;
